snippet: The latest installment of Wally Cardona and Jennifer Lacey’s “Set Up,” at South Street Seaport as part of the River to River Festival, was inspired by French Baroque dance.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews performance of third installment of Wally Cardona and Jennifer Lacey dance piece The Set Up at South Street Seaport as part of the River to River Festival.
lead_paragraph: The latest installment of Wally Cardona and Jennifer Lacey’s “Set Up,” at South Street Seaport as part of the River to River Festival, was inspired by French Baroque dance.

headline.seo: Baroque at the Seaport in Wally Cardona’s ‘Set Up’
headline.main: Romantic Blades of Grass Get a Toe Touch of Baroque at River to River
headline.print_headline: Romantic Blades of Grass Get a Toe Touch of Baroque at River to River
